short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your Fidbox and Hmbox devices

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This software allows you to manage your Fidbox and Hmbox devices including settings of your account and subscriptions. The premium version is free for 30 days and provides all the functions of the Fidbox and Hmbox Apps on your desktop computer plus professional features like offline synchronisation and the creation of reports.
